name: Super Squishy Square Stacker
storyline: Oh no! While you (Gabby) and your best friend (Violet) were hanging out for your girls night, you found this really cool abandoned jelly factory, and one thing led to another and now Violet is stuck in this oversized jar! Conveniently though it seems to be at the end of some weird jelly making machinery, which you can take control of. It's up to you now to free her from this terrible demise by filling the jar with goop and letting her float out!
summary:
Inspired by the likes of Not Tetris and C4D4U's "Satisfying Softbody Tetris" animations; this game sees you controlling jelly-like tetrominos, arranging them in such a way that clears rows, and draining the remaining residue with the two vents at the bottom of the field. Play ends once you've collected enough jelly to fill a container of variable size, depending on which mode you've picked.

The available containers hold a pint (~17 lines), a quart (~33 lines), and a gallon(~133 lines) each. Upon completion, you'll be shown your final time and score, allowing you to decide which to focus on.
